DataElement.preferredName: Person Self-Report Renal Disorder Condition Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify a person's self-report of ever being diagnosed with chronic liver or kidney disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Self-Report Renal Disorder Condition Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being._An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation of an event or information._A neoplastic or non-neoplastic condition affecting the kidney.  Representative examples of non-neoplastic conditions include glomerulonephritis and nephrotic syndrome.  Representative examples of neoplastic conditions include benign processes (e.g., renal lipoma and renal fibroma) and malignant processes (e.g., renal cell carcinoma and renal lymphoma)._A state of being, such as a state of health._Occurrence; an instance of something .

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Person; a human being.:An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation  of an event or information.:A neoplastic or non-neoplastic condition affecting the kidney. Representative examples of non-neoplastic conditions include glomerulonephritis and nephrotic syndrome. Representative examples of neoplastic conditions include benign processes (e.g., renal lipoma and renal fibroma) and malignant processes (e.g., renal cell carcinoma and renal lymphoma).

Concepts.definition: An individual's perspective or subjective interpretation of an event or information.

A neoplastic or non-neoplastic condition affecting the kidney. Representative examples of non-neoplastic conditions include glomerulonephritis and nephrotic syndrome. Representative examples of neoplastic conditions include benign processes (e.g., renal lipoma and renal fibroma) and malignant processes (e.g., renal cell carcinoma and renal lymphoma).

Property.preferredDefinition: A state of being, such as a state of health.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: A state of being, such as a state of health.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
